attributes.additional_details: I think enough  is enough, there is now a threat that the UK want to join USA & Israel to attack Iran. War has currently done nothing. War has bought no peace at all, just more crazy people. Our government cannot even control the knife and gun crime in London, so what they going to fight Iran with? I think enough soldiers and civilians have died already. it's time we people STOP. If the US, Israel or France want to go and have a war then let them we should stay out.
